subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ agreement with the slugger Yoenis Cespedes and his agent came together “very late,” the team’s general manager, Sandy Alderson, said.
snippet: The Mets’ agreement with the slugger Yoenis Cespedes and his agent came together “very late,” the team’s general manager, Sandy Alderson, said.
